    20  type Validator interface {
    21  	// ListValidators lists all validators (if status is empty string) or validators filtered by status.
    22  	// status:
    23  	//  "BOND_STATUS_UNBONDED",
    24  	//  "BOND_STATUS_UNBONDING",
    25  	//	"BOND_STATUS_BONDED",
    26  	ListValidators(ctx context.Context, status string) (*stakingtypes.QueryValidatorsResponse, error)
    27  
    28  	CreateValidator(ctx context.Context, description stakingtypes.Description, commission stakingtypes.CommissionRates,
    29  		selfDelegation math.Int, validatorAddress string, ed25519PubKey string, selfDelAddr string, relayerAddr string, challengerAddr string, blsKey string,
    30  		proposalDepositAmount math.Int, proposalTitle, proposalSummary, proposalMetadata string, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (uint64, string, error)
    31  	EditValidator(ctx context.Context, description stakingtypes.Description, newRate *sdktypes.Dec,
    32  		newMinSelfDelegation *math.Int, newRelayerAddr, newChallengerAddr, newBlsKey string, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    33  	DelegateValidator(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    34  	BeginRedelegate(ctx context.Context, validatorSrcAddr, validatorDestAddr string, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    35  	Undelegate(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    36  	CancelUnbondingDelegation(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, creationHeight int64, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    37  	GrantDelegationForValidator(ctx context.Context, delegationAmount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    38  
    39  	UnJailValidator(ctx context.Context, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    40  	ImpeachValidator(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error)
    41  }
    42  
    43  func (c *client) ListValidators(ctx context.Context, status string) (*stakingtypes.QueryValidatorsResponse, error) {
    44  	return c.chainClient.StakingQueryClient.Validators(ctx, &stakingtypes.QueryValidatorsRequest{Status: status})
    45  }
    46  
    47  // CreateValidator submits a proposal to the Greenfield for creating a validator, and it returns a proposal ID and tx hash.
    48  func (c *client) CreateValidator(ctx context.Context, description stakingtypes.Description, commission stakingtypes.CommissionRates,
    49  	selfDelegation math.Int, validatorAddress string, ed25519PubKey string, selfDelAddr string, relayerAddr string, challengerAddr string, blsKey string,
    50  	proposalDepositAmount math.Int, proposalTitle, proposalSummary, proposalMetadata string, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption,
    51  ) (uint64, string, error) {
    52  	govModule, err := c.GetModuleAccountByName(ctx, govTypes.ModuleName)
    53  	if err != nil {
    54  		return 0, "", err
    55  	}
    56  	govAccountAddr := govModule.GetAddress()
    57  	delegationCoin := sdktypes.NewCoin(gnfdsdktypes.Denom, selfDelegation)
    58  	validator, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorAddress)
    59  	if err != nil {
    60  		return 0, "", err
    61  	}
    62  	selfDel, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(selfDelAddr)
    63  	if err != nil {
    64  		return 0, "", err
    65  	}
    66  	relayer, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(relayerAddr)
    67  	if err != nil {
    68  		return 0, "", err
    69  	}
    70  	challenger, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(challengerAddr)
    71  	if err != nil {
    72  		return 0, "", err
    73  	}
    74  	pk, err := pubKeyFromHex(ed25519PubKey)
    75  	if err != nil {
    76  		return 0, "", err
    77  	}
    78  	msg, err := stakingtypes.NewMsgCreateValidator(validator, pk, delegationCoin, description, commission, selfDelegation, govAccountAddr, selfDel, relayer, challenger, blsKey)
    79  	if err != nil {
    80  		return 0, "", err
    81  	}
    82  	if err = msg.ValidateBasic(); err != nil {
    83  		return 0, "", err
    84  	}
    85  	return c.SubmitProposal(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, proposalDepositAmount, proposalTitle, proposalSummary, types.SubmitProposalOptions{Metadata: proposalMetadata, TxOption: txOption})
    86  }
    87  
    88  // EditValidator edits a existing validator info.
    89  func (c *client) EditValidator(ctx context.Context, description stakingtypes.Description,
    90  	newRate *sdktypes.Dec, newMinSelfDelegation *math.Int, newRelayerAddr, newChallengerAddr, newBlsKey string, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption,
    91  ) (string, error) {
    92  	relayer, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(newRelayerAddr)
    93  	if err != nil {
    94  		return "", err
    95  	}
    96  	challenger, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(newChallengerAddr)
    97  	if err != nil {
    98  		return "", err
    99  	}
   100  	msg := stakingtypes.NewMsgEditValidator(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), description, newRate, newMinSelfDelegation, relayer, challenger, newBlsKey)
   101  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   102  	if err != nil {
   103  		return "", err
   104  	}
   105  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   106  }
   107  
   108  // DelegateValidator makes a delegation to a validator by delegator.
   109  func (c *client) DelegateValidator(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   110  	validator, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorAddr)
   111  	if err != nil {
   112  		return "", err
   113  	}
   114  	msg := stakingtypes.NewMsgDelegate(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), validator, sdktypes.NewCoin(gnfdsdktypes.Denom, amount))
   115  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   116  	if err != nil {
   117  		return "", err
   118  	}
   119  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   120  }
   121  
   122  // BeginRedelegate delegates coins from a delegator and source validator to a destination validator
   123  func (c *client) BeginRedelegate(ctx context.Context, validatorSrcAddr, validatorDestAddr string, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   124  	validatorSrc, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorSrcAddr)
   125  	if err != nil {
   126  		return "", err
   127  	}
   128  	validatorDest, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorDestAddr)
   129  	if err != nil {
   130  		return "", err
   131  	}
   132  	msg := stakingtypes.NewMsgBeginRedelegate(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), validatorSrc, validatorDest, sdktypes.NewCoin(gnfdsdktypes.Denom, amount))
   133  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   134  	if err != nil {
   135  		return "", err
   136  	}
   137  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   138  }
   139  
   140  // Undelegate undelegates tokens from a validator by the delegator.
   141  func (c *client) Undelegate(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   142  	validator, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorAddr)
   143  	if err != nil {
   144  		return "", err
   145  	}
   146  	msg := stakingtypes.NewMsgUndelegate(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), validator, sdktypes.NewCoin(gnfdsdktypes.Denom, amount))
   147  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   148  	if err != nil {
   149  		return "", err
   150  	}
   151  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   152  }
   153  
   154  // CancelUnbondingDelegation cancel the unbonding delegation by delegator
   155  func (c *client) CancelUnbondingDelegation(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, creationHeight int64, amount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   156  	validator, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorAddr)
   157  	if err != nil {
   158  		return "", err
   159  	}
   160  	msg := stakingtypes.NewMsgCancelUnbondingDelegation(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), validator, creationHeight, sdktypes.NewCoin(gnfdsdktypes.Denom, amount))
   161  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   162  	if err != nil {
   163  		return "", err
   164  	}
   165  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   166  }
   167  
   168  // GrantDelegationForValidator grant the gov module for proposal execution
   169  func (c *client) GrantDelegationForValidator(ctx context.Context, delegationAmount math.Int, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   170  	govModule, err := c.GetModuleAccountByName(ctx, govTypes.ModuleName)
   171  	if err != nil {
   172  		return "", err
   173  	}
   174  	delegationCoin := sdktypes.NewCoin(gnfdsdktypes.Denom, delegationAmount)
   175  	authorization, err := stakingtypes.NewStakeAuthorization([]sdktypes.AccAddress{c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress()},
   176  		nil, stakingtypes.AuthorizationType_AUTHORIZATION_TYPE_DELEGATE,
   177  		&delegationCoin)
   178  	if err != nil {
   179  		return "", err
   180  	}
   181  
   182  	msgGrant, err := authz.NewMsgGrant(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(),
   183  		govModule.GetAddress(),
   184  		authorization, nil)
   185  	if err != nil {
   186  		return "", err
   187  	}
   188  
   189  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msgGrant}, &txOption)
   190  	if err != nil {
   191  		return "", err
   192  	}
   193  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   194  }
   195  
   196  // UnJailValidator unjails the validator
   197  func (c *client) UnJailValidator(ctx context.Context, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   198  	msg := slashingtypes.NewMsgUnjail(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress())
   199  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   200  	if err != nil {
   201  		return "", err
   202  	}
   203  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   204  }
   205  
   206  // ImpeachValidator impeaches a validator
   207  func (c *client) ImpeachValidator(ctx context.Context, validatorAddr string, txOption gnfdsdktypes.TxOption) (string, error) {
   208  	validator, err := sdktypes.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(validatorAddr)
   209  	if err != nil {
   210  		return "", err
   211  	}
   212  	msg := slashingtypes.NewMsgImpeach(validator, c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress())
   213  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdktypes.Msg{msg}, &txOption)
   214  	if err != nil {
   215  		return "", err
   216  	}
   217  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, nil
   218  }
   219  
   220  func pubKeyFromHex(pk string) (cryptotypes.PubKey, error) {
   221  	pkBytes, err := hex.DecodeString(pk)
   222  	if err != nil {
   223  		return nil, err
   224  	}
   225  	if len(pkBytes) != ed25519.PubKeySize {
   226  		return nil, errors.ErrInvalidPubKey
   227  	}
   228  	return &ed25519.PubKey{Key: pkBytes}, nil
   229  }
